abstract: Attorneys for Coca-Cola are trying to use the guilty plea of class action king William Lerach to derail a seven-year-old securities fraud case against the soft drink giant.
lead_paragraph: Attorneys for Coca-Cola are trying to use the guilty plea of class action king William Lerach to derail a seven-year-old securities fraud case against the soft drink giant.

headline.main: Coke Hopes Milberg Weiss Case Will End Its Own Suit
